name: Balancing Act (Kolk71)
description:
Balancing Act is a card game with the goal of maintaining your balance while orchestrating the downfall of your friends through clever manipulation of the token economy!

Styled in the most garish colors combination I could think of I have created a card game about balance, chock full of cheap pop culture references and the stretching of logic to pad the card count. All presented through my very own mascot; A vaguely ursine biped named Steve!

Intended for 3 or more players (though not much fun after 6!)
